content.title: First of all, have a great time!
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>Weâ€™re thrilled</> to have you with us on this epic journey.
In ARK youâ€™ll gather resources, craft items, and build shelters to survive the challenges ahead.

As you explore the world, youâ€™ll encounter many creaturesâ€”some friendly, some hostile.
Tame and train them to turn them into valuable allies.

Our server has a friendly, active community thatâ€™s happy to help new players.
Join our Discord to stay up to date with news, events, and updates.

<TextStyle.Green>What to expect</>
â— Reliable, always-online servers with solid hardware
â— Interesting, curated mods
â— Balanced settings (and the occasional crazy server for fun!)
â— Support from admins, helpers, and fellow players
â— Strictly non-toxic environment
â— Real influence on server development via suggestions and polls

Thanks for choosing our ASA servers â€” we hope you have an amazing time!
<TextStyle.Green>Have fun!</>

content.title: This is a PvE server â€” be respectful.
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>Keyboard shortcuts</>
â— F1 â€“ WBUI INFO
â— F3 â€“ VOTE
â— F4 â€“ REPORT
â— F6 â€“ RATE COMMUNITY

Console players can access <TextStyle.Green>function keys</> by holding <TextStyle.Green>X</> on Xbox or <TextStyle.Green>â–¡</> on PlayStation.

When you vote youâ€™ll receive 200 tokens (more for Supporters!).
Use <TextStyle.Green>!Claim</> in <TextStyle.Green>#bot-spam</> on Discord after voting.

<TextStyle.Green>Decay</>:
â— Thatch â€“ 4d
â— Wood â€“ 8d
â— Stone â€“ 12d
â— Metal â€“ 16d
â— Creatures â€“ 8d

To collect <TextStyle.Green>tokens</> properly, new players should link their in-game character with the website account.
After <TextStyle.Green>connecting accounts</>, all tokens (voting, playtime, Supporter) will auto-assign to your account.

Questions? Join our Discord!

content.title: Please read before you play:
content.text:
<TextStyle.Red>Instant ban for:</>
â— Racism, homophobia, or toxic harassment
â— Hacking, cheating, exploiting

<TextStyle.Red>Rules:</>
â— Keep the game enjoyable for everyone
â— Help fellow survivors
â— Donâ€™t block public places (major resources like volcano, spawns, obelisks, artifact caves). Drops & explorer notes are fine.
â— Clean up after yourself
â— No mass land grabs
â— No pillar/foundation spam
â— No massive bases â€” use common sense
â— Max: 1 tribe base + 1 personal outpost per player
â— No PvP (no attacking players, their structures, or tames)
â— No griefing (trapping, blocking resources, etc.)
â— No stealing
â— Respect base boundaries â€” donâ€™t build too close
â— Avoid excessive breeding to prevent server load
â— Donâ€™t beg for help â€” ask nicely; if someone can, they will ğŸ™‚
